name: SCOOP
description:
SCOOP is the addictive puzzle game from Clandestine Games. It will always be completely free, with no ads, no cash shop, and no invasion of your privacy. After losing access to the source code, I've decided to release the price restriction for the premium version. No more themes will be developed, but you can now access all of them for free if you choose. You can think of SCOOP as Donation-ware. You can pay what you want to help a struggling developer, but you will always be able to play the entire game for free.

Gameplay footage provided by PvMPAndang


What's New in SCOOP 0.1.4.0?
  • Improved graphics pipeline for better performance.
  • Dual analog controls on a gamepad. (Right stick to scoop.)
View the complete changelog.
Known issues are here.



What's Included in SCOOP Premium?

Change things up with one of the Premium-exclusive themes!

SCOOP Premium currently adds the following themes to choose from in the Config menu.
  • Chess
  • Halloween
  • Poker


SCOOP is in perpetual Beta. The game is feature-complete, but unpolished. Though rare, you may come across a bug. I hope you enjoy it.
